# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="9be71-102">永久刪除 Outlook.com 中的電子郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9be71-103">若要刪除電子郵件或清空收件匣：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="9be71-104">選取您要刪除的郵件（或選取圓圈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="9be71-105">在郵寄清單頂端的 [**收件**匣] 旁邊，選取您的收件匣中的所有郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9be71-106">在頁面頂端，選取 [**刪除**] （適用于整個資料夾**空白資料夾\*\*\*\*，如果您**已啟用焦點收件匣，**則為空的** / ）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="9be71-107">若要清除所有已刪除的電子郵件，請開啟 [[刪除的郵件] 資料夾](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems)，並選取 [**空白資料夾**]，然後選取頁面頂端的 [可復原的**專案**]，然後選取 [**空白資料夾**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9be71-108">若要深入瞭解，請參閱[刪除 Outlook.com 中的電子郵件](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9be71-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
